Texts.Eng: Fellow Floran! I am thisss tribe's Greenfinger. You look like you a long way from your own tribe, friend.
Greetings, Glitch. I am Greenfinger <selfname>. It iss my role to guide the Floran of this tribe.
Greetings, Hylotl. I am Greenfinger <selfname>. It iss my role to guide the Floran of this tribe.
Greetings, ape. I am Greenfinger <selfname>. It iss my role to guide the Floran of this tribe.
Greetings, bird friend. I am Greenfinger <selfname>. It iss my role to guide the Floran of this tribe.
Greetings, human. I am Greenfinger <selfname>. It iss my role to guide the Floran of this tribe.
Greetings, my ssstrange glowing friend! I am Greenfinger <selfname>, and it iss my role to guide the Floran of this tribe.
Greetings. I am Greenfinger <selfname>. It iss my role to guide the Floran of this tribe.
Hello Hylotl, I am thisss tribe's Greenfinger. It iss my understanding that your people fear our kind, but you have nothing to fear here.
Hello ape, I am thisss tribe's Greenfinger. Don't blame them if they get a bit exciteable, that's jussst how Floran are!
Hello bird friend, I am thisss tribe's Greenfinger. Don't blame them if they get a bit exciteable, that's jussst how Floran are!
Hello human, I am thisss tribe's Greenfinger. Don't blame them if they get a bit exciteable, that's jussst how Floran are!
Hello, Glitch, I am thisss tribe's Greenfinger. Don't blame them if they get a bit exciteable, that's jussst how Floran are!
Hello, I am thisss tribe's Greenfinger. Don't blame them if they get a bit exciteable, that's jussst how Floran are!
Welcome to our tribe, Glitch. I am Greenfinger <selfname>, and we shall treat you with resspect as long as you do the sssame.
Welcome to our tribe, Hylotl. I am Greenfinger <selfname>, and we shall treat you with resspect as long as you do the sssame.
Welcome to our tribe, ape. I am Greenfinger <selfname>, and we shall treat you with resspect as long as you do the sssame.
Welcome to our tribe, bird friend. I am Greenfinger <selfname>, and we shall treat you with resspect as long as you do the sssame.
Welcome to our tribe, fellow Floran. I am Greenfinger <selfname>, and we shall treat you with resspect as long as you do the sssame.
Welcome to our tribe, human. I am Greenfinger <selfname>, and we shall treat you with resspect as long as you do the sssame.
Welcome to our tribe, my sun friend. I am Greenfinger <selfname>, and we shall treat you with resspect as long as you do the sssame.
Welcome to our tribe. I am Greenfinger <selfname>, and we shall treat you with resspect as long as you do the sssame.
Welcome! I am Greenfinger <selfname>. Any Floran are welcome here, as long as you treat us with ressspect, of course.
Welcome! I am thisss tribe's Greenfinger. Don't blame my Floran if they get a bit exciteable, that's jussst how Floran are!
